auth.loginSuccess: You have been successfully logged in
auth.logoutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out
auth.registerSuccess: Registration successful. Please check your email to verify your account
auth.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address first
auth.accountLocked: Your account has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please try again later
auth.emailAlreadyExists: This email address is already registered
auth.passwordTooWeak: Password must be at least 12 characters and contain uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.refreshTokenExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again
auth.tokenExpired: Your authentication token has expired. Please login again
auth.mfaCodeExpired: MFA code has expired. Please request a new one

validation.email: Must be a valid email address
validation.minLength: Must be at least {{min}} characters long
validation.isPhoneNumber: Must be a valid phone number

records.recordAlreadyExists: Medical record with this ID already exists
records.recordAccessDenied: You do not have permission to access this record

access.accessGrantAlreadyExists: Access has already been granted to this record
access.insufficientPermissions: You do not have sufficient permissions to perform this action
access.recordAccessDenied: You do not have access to this record
access.permissionsRequired: At least one permission is required

errors.internalServerError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found
errors.badRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action. Please login
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource
errors.conflict: This operation conflicts with existing data
errors.unprocessableEntity: The request could not be processed. Please check your data
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later
errors.serviceUnavailable: Service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later
errors.databaseError: Database error occurred. Please try again later
errors.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection
errors.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeds maximum allowed size

email.accessGranted: You have been granted access to a medical record
email.accessRevoked: Your access to a medical record has been revoked
email.emailChanged: Your email address has been changed
email.suspiciousActivity: Suspicious activity detected on your account
